document.full_text: u.s. dependence on imported oil fell below 50 percent in 2010 for the first time in more than a decade, thanks in part to the weak economy and more fuel efficient vehicles, the energy department said on wednesday.
document.title: u.s. relies less on oil imports to meet fuel demand: government
lines_and_colors: u.s. dependence on imported oil fell below 50 percent in 2010 for the first time in more than a decade, thanks in part to the weak economy and more fuel efficient vehicles, the energy department said on wednesday.
